basics.name: Sarah Martinez
basics.label: Lead UX Designer
basics.summary: Creative and user-focused Lead UX Designer with 8+ years of experience crafting intuitive digital experiences. Passionate about accessibility and inclusive design. Proven track record of leading design teams and delivering impactful solutions for enterprise clients.

work.name: DesignFirst Agency
work.summary: Leading UX design team for enterprise clients
highlights: Lead a team of 6 designers across multiple high-profile projects
Increased client satisfaction scores by 35% through improved design processes
Implemented design system that reduced design time by 40%
Mentored junior designers and established design critique program

work.name: InnovateTech
work.summary: Led UX design for flagship product
highlights: Redesigned core product interface resulting in 45% increase in user engagement
Established user research program and conducted over 200 user interviews
Created accessibility guidelines improving WCAG compliance

work.name: CreativeWorks Studio
work.summary: Designed user experiences for mobile applications
highlights: Designed interfaces for 15+ iOS and Android applications
Reduced user error rates by 60% through iterative design
Collaborated with development team to ensure design feasibility

projects.name: HealthCare Portal Redesign
projects.description: Complete redesign of major healthcare provider's patient portal
